subject: Aw: Order #SSN5258 confirmed
description_text:

conversations.body_text: Hi Timo Lamm,    Your order has been shipped. We apologize for not updating you in a timely manner.  CE326638195DE

Dear Simsonn Team, 
 
 according to your return policy I have to cancel the order within 12 hours of purchase what I did, so I expect a refund in a timely manner. The first package was delivered with just 2 brackets, see open case for delivery SF6047201468555 
 
 Please let me know what you expect me to do with those. 
 
 If the second package arrives, I will try to refuse the acceptance. 
 
 Please respond to my email, thank you and have a nice day 
 Timo 
 
 
 Gesendet: Mittwoch, 31. Dezember 2025 um 09:54
Hi Timo Lamm,  I apologize for not responding to you promptly. I see your package has been delivered. Have you received it?     https://t.17track.net/en#nums=CE326638195DE,SF6047201468555
Hello Please open the details tab you will see that I refused the delivery. Thanks Timo Gesendet mit der GMX Mail App Am 15.01.26 um 10:45 schrieb service@simsonn.com
Hello Can you please proceed with the refund? Thanks Timo Gesendet mit der GMX Mail App Am 15.01.26 um 11:30 schrieb service@simsonn.com
Hi Timo Lamm,     We will issue a refund once the package is returned. https://www.dhl.de/en/privatkunden/pakete-empfangen/verfolgen.html?piececode=CE326638195DE&cid=c_dhl_2502061_2353
